sentences.sContent: The thought of taking the exam again depressed him.
sentences.sCn: 想到要补考，他就心情沮丧。

sentences.sContent: It depresses me that nobody seems to care.
sentences.sCn: 似乎没有人在乎，这让我感到很沮丧。

remMethod.val: de(向下) + press(挤压) → 压下

words.tran: 抑压者；抑压物；压板；降肌
使沮丧；使萧条（depress的过去式和过去分词形式）；压低

trans.tranCn: 使沮丧， 使消沉； 使不景气， 削弱； 按下， 压下； 使贬值
trans.tranOther: to make someone feel very unhappy
